channel.title: Abouts on Lanfran02 - Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Lanfran02 - Blog

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! My name is Lanfran and I’m the author of this blog. I made it to help you hack your way to learn! We all know how hard is to start in capture the flag. You need to prepare a bunch of stuff, know how things works and read, A LOT This blog is pretty basic and covers some of the rooms in CTFs platforms. All you have to do is start hacking!
